Class AbstractButtonBuilder<T,E extends AbstractInlineMenuBuilder>

  • java.lang.Object
    • pro.zackpollard.telegrambot.api.menu.button.AbstractButtonBuilder<T,E>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - implementing type
    E - menu builder type
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BackButtonBuilder, SubInlineMenuButtonBuilder, ToggleInlineMenuButtonBuilder, UserInputInlineMenuButtonBuilder

extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract methods used across all button creation
